93 inline CHalfEdge * CHalfEdge::ccw_rotate_about_target()
94 {
95  CHalfEdge * he_dual = he_sym();
96  if( he_dual == NULL ) return NULL;
97 
98  return he_dual->he_prev();
99 };

103 inline CHalfEdge * CHalfEdge::clw_rotate_about_target()
104 {
105  CHalfEdge * he = he_next()->he_sym();
106  return he;
107 };

121 inline CHalfEdge * CHalfEdge::clw_rotate_about_source()
122 {
123  CHalfEdge * he = he_sym();
124  if( he == NULL ) return NULL;

126 };
